00034   class image_utils
00035   {
00036   public:
00037     static bool loadBMP(const char* Imagefile, int& Width, int& Height, int& BPP, bool Flip, unsigned char*& Pixels);
00038     static bool saveBMP(const char* Imagefile, int Width, int Height, int BPP, bool Flip, unsigned char* Pixels);
00039     
00040     static bool loadPGM(const char* Imagefile, int& Width, int& Height, int& BPP, bool Flip, unsigned char*& Pixels);
00041     static bool savePGM(const char* Imagefile, int Width, int Height, int BPP, bool Flip, unsigned char* Pixels);
00042     static bool loadPNG(const char* Imagefile, int& Width, int& Height, bool Flip, unsigned char*& Pixels);
00043     static bool savePNG(const char* Imagefile, int Width, int Height, bool Flip, unsigned char* Pixels);
00044 
00045     static bool loadJPG(const char* Imagefile, int& Width, int& Height, bool Flip, unsigned char*& Pixels);
00046     static bool saveJPG(const char* Imagefile, int Width, int Height, bool Flip, unsigned char* Pixels);
00047 
00048   };
